newsitem.title: USA: Nimbus selected to make Microsoft products.
newsitem.headline: Nimbus selected to make Microsoft products.

text.p: Nimbus CD International Inc said it signed a contract with Microsoft Corp to become an authorised replicator for Microsoft OEM products.

As a member of the authorised replicator programme, Nimbus said it is approved to supply complete OEM products including CD-ROM disc manufacturing, print collateral materials, packaging assembly and related order fulfilment services for all Microsoft licensed Original Equipment Manufacturers and Delivery Service Partners in North America.
The current agreement will cover Nimbus' North American operations.
The contract places Nimbus in the position of being one of a limited number of compact disc replication facilities in North America to have received such designation, Nimbus said.
Nimbus said the pact opens the possibility for new, direct and indirect sales access to major PC manufacturers who bundle Microsoft products.
Nimbus is an independent manufacturer of compact discs distributed throughout North America, the United Kingdom and continental Europe.
